thread.title: Patriot Coal Executives Must Sit for Questioning, Judge Rules
thread.title_full: Patriot Coal Executives Must Sit for Questioning, Judge Rules - WSJ

author: Jacqueline Palank
title: Patriot Coal Executives Must Sit for Questioning, Judge Rules
text:
A bankruptcy judge said Patriot Coal Corp. must make its top executives available for questioning by West Virginia environmental regulators who are concerned about the coal miner’s upcoming sale.
At a hearing Wednesday, Judge Kevin Phillips of the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Richmond, Va., denied Patriot’s request to quash the subpoenas brought by the West Virginia Department of Environmental Protection against Chief Executive Robert... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
